lyrics:
Joss, how much lovin do you need

I wanna say get it

So tell me babe

(How it feels)

Let's seal the deal

Tell you how I feel
(How it feels)

Let's seal the deal

Tell me tell me cause I won't wait suspense
I just hate so spit it out now
If you're feeling like I do, won't you come and do it to me
So tell me babe

So tell me babe
(Tell me 'bout it)
Tell me how I feel
(How you feel)
And if the feeling's real
(Feeling's real)
Tell me what's the deal
(Hey, hey, hey)

Mmm

Tell me

Tell me baby
